title: Happy Hours in Colombo 2017
abstract: How and where to drink fancy on the cheap
author: Kinita
content:
You booze, you lose...money. With 10% service charge, 15% VAT, and 384940% assorted taxes, your friendly neighbourhood cocktail will now cost you a hell of a lot more. How to drink on the cheap then? Short of visiting one of Colombo's dodgier establishments (ey
), you need to trawl for happy hours like a thrifty little elf. Here's an updated list of where to go, when to go, and what to expect to spend.
If you know of any other great happy hours in Colombo, drop us a comment and we'll add them on!




Kaema Sutra (Shangri-La)























As a general rule, your best bet for happy houring is right after work, around sunset. Have fun, drink responsibly, and please don't drive afterwards. Instead of boozing and cruising down the rickety roads of the big papol, get yourself a
